event_description: User clicked to expand/collapse a project card to view details
User filtered projects by category (all, ai, product, quant, music)
User clicked on a social/contact link (email, twitter, github, instagram, tiktok)
User clicked on a blog post/thought from the list to read it
User viewed a specific blog post/thought detail page (conversion event for content engagement)
Admin user attempted to login to the admin interface
Admin login attempt failed with invalid credentials (potential security/churn indicator)
Admin saved/created a new thought/blog post
User clicked on a company link (PGI, Atlantic, Range Media) in the about section
User clicked a navigation link in the navbar
Admin user logged out of the admin interface
